VLIB_normalize_input_i8u_o16s_tile

Detailed Description


Functions

void VLIB_normalize_input_i8u_o16s_tile (const sBuffer_t *pInChannel, const sBuffer_t *pOutChannel, int16_t bias, uint8_t shift)

Function Documentation

void VLIB_normalize_input_i8u_o16s_tile ( const sBuffer_t *  pInChannel,
const sBuffer_t *  pOutChannel,
int16_t  bias,
uint8_t  shift 
)

Description:
Performs normalization of N 8-bit inputs channels with bias producing N 16-bit outputs channels.
Each W x H 8-bit inputs in an input channel produce W x H 16-bit outputs.

Parameters:
[in] *pInChannel Pointer to N 8-bit input channels
[out] *pOutChannel Pointer to N 16-bit ouput channels
[in] bias bias value
[in] shift Shift value to adjust output to 16 bit
Assumptions:
  • Input and output addresses are aligned to 8-bytes.
  • Widths are assumed to be a multiple of 8
Implementation Notes:
The code is interruptible.
